metas.name: Parks and Recreation
metas.description: Similar to 'New Girl' and 'The Good Place', this is a highly-rated, feel-good sitcom with quirky characters and optimistic humor that focuses on workplace camaraderie and small-town charm. It offers a similar lighthearted and uplifting vibe.

metas.name: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
metas.description: If you enjoyed the ensemble comedy and witty banter of 'New Girl' and 'It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia', you'll love this police procedural sitcom. It's consistently funny, features lovable characters, and balances humor with heartwarming moments.

metas.name: Community
metas.description: This show shares the meta-humor and genre-bending creativity found in 'The Simpsons' and 'Rick and Morty', while also offering the ensemble chemistry of 'New Girl'. It's intelligent, hilarious, and often surprisingly heartfelt.

metas.name: Schitt's Creek
metas.description: A perfect fit for fans of 'Ted Lasso' and 'New Girl', this series is incredibly heartwarming and hilarious, focusing on a wealthy family's adjustment to living in a small town. It's a show that truly grows on you and becomes a feel-good favorite.

metas.name: The Office (US)
metas.description: Like 'Silicon Valley' and 'It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia', this mockumentary sitcom excels at workplace humor and character-driven comedy. It has a similar blend of cringe, heart, and quotable lines.

metas.name: Archer
metas.description: Fans of witty, adult animation like 'Rick and Morty' and 'The Simpsons' will appreciate the sharp dialogue, pop culture references, and absurd situations in 'Archer'. It's a stylish and consistently funny spy parody.

metas.name: Veep
metas.description: If you appreciate the cynical humor and sharp writing of 'It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia' and 'Silicon Valley', 'Veep' offers a hilarious and biting look at political incompetence with some of the best insults on television.

metas.name: Bob's Burgers
metas.description: For those who enjoy the long-running, character-focused humor of 'The Simpsons' and 'Futurama', 'Bob's Burgers' provides a consistently funny and warm-hearted animated sitcom about a quirky family running a burger joint.

metas.name: What We Do in the Shadows
metas.description: This mockumentary about vampire roommates shares the absurd humor and character-driven comedy found in shows like 'It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia' and 'The Office'. It's incredibly witty and consistently hilarious.

metas.name: The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel
metas.description: With its quick wit, vibrant characters, and aspirational storylines, this show echoes the feel-good nature of 'Ted Lasso' and the comedic timing of 'New Girl'. It's visually stunning and wonderfully written.

metas.name: Avatar: The Last Airbender
metas.description: This animated series offers a perfect blend of action-adventure, humor, and heartfelt storytelling, similar to what you might have enjoyed in 'Angels of Death' and 'One-Punch Man', but with a more universally appealing and uplifting narrative.

metas.name: Kim's Convenience
metas.description: A charming and gentle sitcom akin to 'New Girl' and 'Schitt's Creek', this show focuses on a Korean-Canadian family running a convenience store. It's full of relatable humor, warmth, and genuine character moments.

metas.name: Abbott Elementary
metas.description: This mockumentary sitcom is a perfect follow-up for fans of 'The Office' and 'Parks and Recreation'. It's laugh-out-loud funny, optimistic, and features a brilliant ensemble cast with a strong focus on heartwarming stories.

metas.name: Letterkenny
metas.description: For fans of sharp, rapid-fire dialogue and observational humor similar to 'It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia' and 'Goodness Gracious Me', this Canadian series offers a unique and hilarious look at small-town life.

metas.name: Crazy Ex-Girlfriend
metas.description: If you enjoyed the blend of comedy, musical numbers, and genuine emotional depth in shows like 'The Good Place' and 'New Girl', this series offers a unique and incredibly engaging experience that's both hilarious and thought-provoking.

metas.name: Futurama
metas.description: Already watched, but this is a prime example of the animated sci-fi comedy you enjoy. If by some chance it was missed, it's a must-watch with its blend of humor, heart, and imaginative storytelling.

metas.name: Arrested Development
metas.description: This show is a masterclass in intricate comedic plotting and character-driven humor, similar to 'It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia' and 'Peep Show'. Its unique style and endlessly quotable lines make it a cult favorite.

metas.name: Space Force
metas.description: Co-created by Greg Daniels (The Office, Parks and Rec) and featuring Steve Carell, this show offers a workplace comedy with a sci-fi twist, appealing to fans of 'Silicon Valley' and 'The Good Place' for its blend of humor and ambitious, if flawed, endeavors.

metas.name: MythBusters
metas.description: Already watched, but this is a prime example of the documentary content you enjoy. If by some chance it was missed, it's a must-watch for its engaging approach to science and experimentation.

metas.name: The IT Crowd
metas.description: For fans of quirky British humor and workplace comedy similar to 'Peep Show' and 'Goodness Gracious Me', this sitcom about two IT technicians and their boss is filled with absurd situations and memorable characters.

metas.name: 30 Rock
metas.description: This show offers rapid-fire jokes, meta-humor, and a strong ensemble cast, reminiscent of 'It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia' and 'The Simpsons'. It's a smart, satirical take on television production.

metas.name: Superstore
metas.description: If you enjoyed the workplace dynamics and character-focused humor of 'New Girl' and 'The Office', 'Superstore' provides a similar feel-good, funny look at the lives of employees in a big-box store.

metas.name: Only Murders in the Building
metas.description: This mystery-comedy offers a delightful blend of intrigue and humor, with a charming cast and witty dialogue, similar to the cleverness found in 'The Good Place' and 'Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency'. It's light, fun, and engaging.

metas.name: Wilfred (US)
metas.description: This show offers a surreal and dark comedic premise, similar to the offbeat nature of 'It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia' and 'Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency'. It's a unique take on mental health and friendship.

metas.name: Impractical Jokers
metas.description: For a pure dose of lighthearted, absurd comedy and pranks, this reality show is perfect. It's the kind of show that's easy to watch and guaranteed to make you laugh, similar to the lightheartedness of 'Top Buzzer'.

metas.name: Fleabag
metas.description: While having dramatic undertones, 'Fleabag' is also incredibly witty and darkly comedic, appealing to fans of shows like 'It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia' and 'Peep Show' for its raw honesty and sharp writing. It's a critically acclaimed gem.

metas.name: Trailer Park Boys
metas.description: This mockumentary offers a unique brand of low-brow, observational humor and chaotic situations, similar to the unapologetic comedy of 'It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia' and the raw, unscripted feel that can be found in some reality shows.

metas.name: Regular Show
metas.description: A fantastic animated comedy for adults, much like 'The Simpsons' and 'Futurama', but with its own unique surreal humor and often surprisingly deep storylines. It's fun, inventive, and always entertaining.

metas.name: Silicon Valley
metas.description: Already watched, but this is a prime example of the tech-centric workplace comedy you enjoy. If by some chance it was missed, it's a must-watch for its sharp satire and relatable characters.

metas.name: Black Mirror
metas.description: While some episodes can be dark, the anthology format of 'Black Mirror' offers a diverse range of sci-fi narratives, some of which lean into darkly comedic or thought-provoking adventures similar to 'Rick and Morty' and 'The Good Place', but with a more cautionary tone.

metas.name: Adventure Time
metas.description: This animated series offers a whimsical and imaginative world with humor that appeals to both children and adults, similar to 'The Simpsons' and 'Futurama'. It's full of creative storytelling and lighthearted fun.

metas.name: The Office (UK)
metas.description: The original mockumentary that inspired many, this offers a drier, more cringe-inducing humor than its US counterpart, but shares the observational comedy and relatable workplace dynamics that fans of 'Peep Show' and 'It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia' might appreciate.

metas.name: Party Down
metas.description: This show features a fantastic ensemble cast and sharp, witty dialogue about a group of caterers chasing their acting dreams. It's a dark but hilarious comedy that fans of 'It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia' and 'Silicon Valley' will enjoy for its cynical charm.

metas.name: Wellington Paranormal
metas.description: A spin-off of 'What We Do in the Shadows', this mockumentary follows two bumbling police officers investigating supernatural occurrences. It's absurdly funny and offers a similar lighthearted, comedic approach to the supernatural as 'Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency'.

metas.name: Taskmaster
metas.description: This hilarious reality competition show features comedians attempting ridiculous tasks set by the Taskmaster. It's pure, unadulterated fun and wit, akin to the comedic performances in shows like 'Top Buzzer' and the lighthearted chaos of 'Gogglebox'.

metas.name: Corner Gas
metas.description: A gentle and charming Canadian sitcom set in a small prairie town. It's full of observational humor and likable characters, offering a similar feel-good, easy-watching experience to 'New Girl' and 'Parks and Recreation'.

metas.name: The League
metas.description: This comedy about a fantasy football league offers a raunchy and hilarious look at friendship and competition, similar to the ensemble dynamics and sharp banter of 'It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia'.

metas.name: Bojack Horseman
metas.description: While it delves into darker themes, 'Bojack Horseman' is also incredibly funny and often surreal, with brilliant satire and character development that fans of 'Rick and Morty' and 'The Simpsons' will appreciate. It balances humor and pathos expertly.

metas.name: Dave
metas.description: This comedy series, starring Dave Burd (Lil Dicky), follows a man's journey to become a successful rapper. It's self-aware, funny, and has a similar blend of aspiration and awkwardness that you might have enjoyed in 'Master of None' and 'Ted Lasso'.

metas.name: Kim Possible
metas.description: A fun, action-packed animated series with a lighthearted tone and a great sense of humor. This would appeal to your enjoyment of action-adventure animation like 'One-Punch Man' and 'Angels of Death', but with a more family-friendly and comedic focus.
